entries.journal_entry_description: The Sect frowns on wastefulness, especially when it comes to the Webweaver. Webweaver meats, venom glands, and even bones, are used for various functions within the Society. Rhiek Okina, leader of the Sect, wants you to retrieve 7 Tombsinger bones and bring them back to him.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Collect 7 Tombsinger Bones and return to Rhiek Okina.
